import React, { useContext } from 'react' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import './Nav.css' import {uc} from './UserContext' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' const Navbar = () => { let ur = useContext(uc) let nav = useNavigate() // get context let onLogoutClick = (e) => { e.preventDefault() uc.setuser({isLoggedIn: false, currentUserId: null, currentUserName: null}) nav('/') } return (
  • E-COMMERCE
  • Dashboad
  • Login
  • Register
  • User
    • Logout
) } export default Navbar
